Texts.Chs: 日复一日，恐惧之翼变得更加愤怒，因为机械人的数量从未增加。事实上，他的愤怒是如此之大，以至于他把他的臣民从城堡的塔上投掷出去，从而导致人口减少而不是增长。而这使他更加生气。
Texts.Eng: Day by day, Dreadwing grew more apoplectic as the number of Glitch never grew. In fact, his anger was such that he took to hurling his subjects from the castle tower, thus causing the population to shrink rather than grow. This made him even more angry.

Texts.Chs: 一天，一群机械人科学家突然想到一个主意。当然，他们不知道如何制造更多的盔甲，但他们相当擅长制造时髦的盔甲。人们常常谈论这些盔甲看起来像格林奇本身，于是他们开始委托一些铁匠制造尽可能多的盔甲。
Texts.Eng: One day, a group of Glitch scientists hit upon an idea. They had no idea how to create more of their number, of course, but they were rather adept at making stylish suits of armour. It had often been remarked upon how the armour looked like the Glitch themselves, and so they set to work commissioning a number of blacksmiths to make as many suits of armour as possible.
